name: mermaid
description: Generate diagrams and flowcharts using Mermaid syntax
author: Shinkai

code.description: Mermaid syntax diagram definition (flowchart, sequence, etc). Must follow Mermaid.js syntax rules

format.description: Output image format: svg (vector, default) or png (raster). SVG recommended for diagrams

image.description: Base64 encoded diagram image data. Can be decoded to view/save the generated diagram

format.description: Actual format of returned image data (svg/png). Matches input format unless conversion occurred
